Monday.Breakfast: Idli (4 pcs), Ghuguni, Coconut & Groundnut Chutney, Tea
Monday.Lunch: Rice, Roti, Dal, Egg Masala / Sagamuga, Aloo Baigan Bharta, Dahi, Salad
Monday.Snack: Mix Veg Chowmin, Chilli and Tomato Sauce, Coffee
Monday.Dinner: Rice, Roti, Dal, Soyabean Aloo Kasa, Cabbage Matar, Fruit Custard

Tuesday.Lunch: Rice, Roti, Dal, Chicken Aloo Kasa / Navaratna Korma, Dahi Kadhi, Papad
Tuesday.Snack: Dahi Vada (2 nos), Aludum, Onion and Sev, Tea
Tuesday.Dinner: Rice, Roti, Dal, Egg Bhurji / Paneer Bhurji, Aloo Beans Bhaja, Sweet Curd

Wednesday.Breakfast: Masala Upma, Ghuguni, Coconut & Groundnut Chutney, Tea
Wednesday.Lunch: Rice, Roti, Dal, Mustard Fish with Aloo / Mushroom & Green Peas Masala, Aloo Cauliflower Bhaja, Salad
Wednesday.Snack: Paneer Patties (1 pc big), Chilli & Tomato Sauce, Coffee
Wednesday.Dinner: Hyderabadi Chicken (2 pcs @150gm) Dum Biryani, Raita, 1 pc Boiled Egg / Mix Veg Dum Biryani, Paneer Curry, Raita, Rasagola

Thursday.Breakfast: Bada (4 pcs), Aloo Dum, Coconut & Groundnut Chutney, Tea
Thursday.Lunch: Rice, Roti, Dal, Egg Do Piaza / Potal Korma, Cabbage Matar Bhaja, Papad
Thursday.Dinner: Rice, Roti, Dal, Egg Tadka / Paneer Tadka, Finger Chips, Salad

Friday.Breakfast: Bread (4 pcs) Omelette (2 eggs), Tea / Bread (4 pcs), Jam, Banana (big size), Tea
Friday.Lunch: Rice, Roti, Dal, Fish Kalia (2 pcs) / Cauliflower Aloo Kasa, Tomato Chutney, Papad
Friday.Snack: Pampdi Chat, Onion, Sev, Dahi, Pudina Chutney, Coffee
Friday.Dinner: Rice, Roti, Dal, Hyderabadi Chicken / Paneer Butter Masala, Seasonal Bhaja, Malpua

Saturday.Breakfast: Uttapam (2 pcs), Sambar, Coconut & Groundnut Chutney, Coffee
Saturday.Lunch: Rice, Roti, Dal, Egg Aloo Curry / Chena Curry, Cabbage Beans Green Peas Bhaja, Salad
Saturday.Snack: Vada Pav (1 pc big), Fried Chilli, Pudina Chutney, Tea
Saturday.Dinner: Rice, Roti, Dal, Chicken Home Style / Mushroom Besar, Chilli Soya, Papad

Sunday_Odd.Breakfast: Onion Masala Dosa (1 pc), Coconut & Groundnut Chutney, Tea
Sunday_Odd.Lunch: Veg Dum Biryani, Chicken Curry / Paneer Curry, Raita, Papad
Sunday_Odd.Dinner: Rice, Roti, Dal, Non-Veg Ghanta with Prawns (5 pcs) / Mix Veg Ghanta with Paneer, Dahi Bundi, Ice Cream

Sunday_Even.Breakfast: Onion Masala Dosa (1 pc), Coconut & Groundnut Chutney, Tea
Sunday_Even.Lunch: Rice, Roti, Dal, Mudhi Ghanta (NVG) / Mix Veg Ghanta with Paneer, Karela Chips, Salad
